data.comment: Today's referee, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro, has blown to start the match.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 8, Santos have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 14, At Urbano Caldeira, Santos are penalized for being offside.
Santos have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 16, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
An attacking Santos player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
A massive blow for Santos as Carlos Sanchez misses from the spot.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Bragantino at Urbano Caldeira.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Santos's Marinho gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Santos.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bragantino's Ricardo Ryller gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 24, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Santos Bragantino drive forward through Artur. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 26, Free kick in a good position for Santos!
Santos's Para misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Bragantino needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Bragantino.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
In the minute 31, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Bragantino throw-in in Santos's half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Fabricio Bruno's header is off-target for Bragantino.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Santos.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 36, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Bragantino drives forward and Morato gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Santos.
In the minute 37, Free kick Bragantino.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Santos a goal kick.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Santos's Kaio Jorge attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro waits before resuming play because Fabricio Bruno for Bragantino is still down.
In the minute 42, Fabricio Bruno is back on the pitch.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 44, Santos have a goal kick.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 45, 5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Bragantino.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
The first-half has come to a close in Santos.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 47, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Santos throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Bragantino.
Bragantino push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Artur gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santos defence.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 53, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Santos.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Santos in the half of Bragantino.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos.
In Santos, Bragantino push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 60, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Goal kick for Bragantino at Urbano Caldeira.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Bragantino throw-in in Santos's half.
In the minute 63, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ricardo Ryller is booked for the away team.
In the minute 65, Santos take a 1-0 lead thanks to Marinho.
Alison with an assist there.
In the minute 66, Free kick Bragantino.
Fernando Uribe is replacing Kaio Jorge for the home team.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Bragantino's area.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 71, Yeferson Soteldo of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Bragantino's Alerrandro has run offside.
Ytalo (Bragantino) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Alerrandro with Ytalo. This is the first substitution made today by Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao.
In the minute 75, Bragantino are coming forward and Matheus Jesus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 77, Santos's Yeferson Soteldo is whistled for offside at Urbano Caldeira.
Morato for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marinho for Santos who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
It seems as if Marinho is unable to continue. Jean Mota replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 80, Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao is making the team's second substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Claudinho replacing Ricardo Ryller.
Bruno Tubarao is on a sub for Morato for Bragantino.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
Matheus Jesus for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 89, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Bragantino drive upfield and Bruno Tubarao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Santos defender.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Urbano Caldeira.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
That's full-time at Urbano Caldeira. The final score is 1-1.
Robinho is replacing Weverson for Bragantino at Urbano Caldeira.
Goal! Claudinho levels the match at 1-1.
